statements: SELECT * FROM user_balances WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_balances WHERE balance > 100;
SELECT balance, user_id FROM user_balances ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_balances WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_balances WHERE user_id BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_balances WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT balance, user_id FROM user_balances WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM user_balances WHERE balance BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(balance) AS avg_balance FROM user_balances GROUP BY user_id HAVING AVG(balance) > 500;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM user_balances;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_balance;
SELECT update_id, amount, update_time, user_id FROM balance_updates;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_balance ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_balance WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT update_id, amount, update_time, user_id FROM balance_updates WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM user_balance WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_balance WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM balance_updates GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, balance, update_time FROM user_balance JOIN balance_updates ON user_balance.user_id = balance_updates.user_id ORDER BY update_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(balance) AS max_balance FROM user_balance;
SELECT user_id, username, balance FROM users
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100
SELECT user_id, current_balance FROM balances ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT username, balance FROM users WHERE balance < 0
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, balance FROM users ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT u.username, b.current_balance, t.amount FROM users u JOIN balances b ON u.user_id = b.user_id JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.amount > 100;
SELECT u.username, b.current_balance FROM users u LEFT JOIN balances b ON u.user_id = b.user_id WHERE b.current_balance < 0 ORDER BY b.current_balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT username, balance FROM user_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM user_transactions WHERE amount < 0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM user_transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 100 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_transactions FROM user_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_transactions > 5000;
SELECT user_logs.log_id, user_accounts.username, user_logs.log_message FROM user_logs JOIN user_accounts ON user_logs.user_id = user_accounts.user_id;
SELECT u.username, n.notification_message FROM user_notifications n JOIN user_accounts u ON n.user_id = u.user_id WHERE DATE(n.notification_timestamp) = CURDATE();
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, balance FROM users WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM users WHERE balance < 500 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, balance FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM withdrawals ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_deposits FROM deposits GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_deposits > 1000;
